opinion:
ABSTRACTS OF SUMMARY DISPOSITIONS, 422 N.W.2d 109 (1988)Supreme Court of South Dakota. FISCAL YEAR 1988(Third Quarter) ABSTRACTS OF SUMMARY DISPOSITIONS
Pursuant to SDCL 15-26A-87.1(C), summary dispositions of appeals filed in the South Dakota Supreme Court may not be cited or relied upon as authority in any litigation in any court in South Dakota except when the decision establishes the law of the case, res judicata or collateral estoppel, or in any criminal action or proceeding involving the same defendant or a disciplinary action or proceeding involving the same person.
